subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez went 1 for 4 with a solo homer Saturday in his first extended spring training game in St. Petersburg, Fla. It was his first game since being sidelined April 28 by a strained right quadriceps.
snippet: Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez went 1 for 4 with a solo homer Saturday in his first extended spring training game in St. Petersburg, Fla. It was his first game since being sidelined April 28 by a strained right quadriceps.
